structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Disposition of revenue from waterworks in city with population of 20,000 or more.
law.text: The net revenue derived by any city with a population equal to or greater than twenty thousand (20,000) based upon the most recent federal decennial census created pursuant to KRS 96.320 from its waterworks shall be applied to the improvement or reconstruction of the streets and other public ways of the city, to the extension of the waterworks system or to the payment of interest or principal on the waterworks bonds.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 163, effective January 1, 2015. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3104.
